Text:
Thank you very much for this! Fantastic movie, fantastic quality!
V 10
A 10
Thanks for the u/l. This is a true blu ray rip (1920 X 1080). To change to English use mkvtoolnix.
@Hyperion888 hey man, i downloaded mkvtoolnix but I'm totally lost on what to do to get it in english. a little help please...

@SNZ.17
Start up mkvmerge
Open the movie (drag and drop if you want) â you will see all the tracks
Highlight the audio tracks and make the English track default
Hit Start muxing.
Mkvmerge will create a new movie file with an English track as default.
Delete the original and use the new .mkv
WARNING: This is the uk/european version and is about 20mins shorter than the US version. It misses out the scene when danny collapses and the doctor comes round.

^
other than that the quality is excellent
